This program depends on tesseract-ocr and https://github.com/CHamburr/PokeAssistant/tree/master/src
host this bot on your server first: https://github.com/CHamburr/PokeAssistant/tree/master/src
then follow this to install tesseract-ocr: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=haHuVAUGY5Y
download it and add it to your path.
